concept.title: Valid Type Conversions
concept.shortdesc: The following table lists the data types that can be converted to another data type. Byte Array, List, and Map data types cannot be converted.

row.entry: data type conversionsvalidvalid data type conversionslistBoolean
Byte, Decimal, Double, Float, Integer, Long, Short, String
Decimal, Double, Float, Integer, Long, Short, String
Byte, Double, Float, Integer, Long, Short, String
Byte, Decimal, Integer, Float, Long, Short, String
Byte, Decimal, Double, Integer, Long, Short, String
Byte, Decimal, Double, Float, Long, Short, String
Byte, Decimal, Double, Float, Integer, Short, String
Byte, Decimal, Double, Float, Integer, Long, String
All supported data types except for Byte Array, List, and Map.
